about_the_game:
Shadows in Silence – a multiplayer horror game where one player assumes the role of the blind witch Elliana, sensitive to sound, accompanied by her faithful pet named Sharm. The other four players take on the roles of survivors, seeking to avoid a deadly threat and neutralize the killer.

Play as a Survivor

Try to be quieter

The killer is blind but has a keen sense of hearing. Any noise you make may attract her attention.

Don't let the killer catch you

Utilize various abilities and obstacles on the map.

Defeat the killer

Repair the sound speakers and start a concert on stage using the mixer console; this will incapacitate the killer.

Play as a Killer

Use abilities to catch survivors

If they make too much noise, they leave traces. Your faithful pet cat Sharm also aids in capturing them.

Thwart the plans of the survivors

Prevent survivors from repairing sound speakers and operating the mixer console. If the sound becomes too intense, you will perish.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features katana blows to the survivor's body. Sounds of blows and breaking bones.

short_description: Shadows in Silence is a 4 vs 1 multiplayer horror game. One player takes on the role of the killer - the witch Elliana and her cat named Sharm. And the other four players play as survivors trying to neutralize the killer.
